vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments on the adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. (1) to the FY 2022-23 Action Plan to: (a) use unspent prior year Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Funds in the amount of $2,971,130 for the Residential Development Acquisition Loan Program; (b) use unspent CDBG CARES Act Relief Funds in the amount of $403,405 for the Emergency Assistance Program; (c) use unspent Housing Opportunities for Persons with Aids CARES Act Relief Funds in the amount of $69,229 for the Emergency Assistance Program; (d) amend Schedule B to the FY 2022-23 HUD Consolidated Plan Budget for CDBG; and (e) to add an activity for Out-of-School Time Program-Community Sites and reallocate $97,441 from Out-of-School Time Program-School Sites to the new activity; and (2) correct the department for Americans with Disabilities Act Improvements; and, at the close of the public hearing, authorize final adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2022-23 Action Plan - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
